mapper.insert: insert into DOLBOMI VALUES(#{dol_id},#{dol_pwd},#{dol_name},#{resident_no}, #{dol_phone},#{term_code},#{dol_termyesno}, #{dol_email}, #{dol_address}, sysdate, sysdate, #{bank}, #{dol_account}, NULL, NULL, #{license_code}, #{office_code}, default)
mapper.select: select sum(salary * 0.045) from dolbomi where salary > 310000
select sum(salary *0.0323) from dolbomi where salary > 278950
SELECT max(SUBSTR(DOL_ENROLLDATE,4,2)) FROM DOLBOMI WHERE DOL_ENROLLDATE LIKE '%'|| #{value} ||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DOLBOMI WHERE DOL_ENROLLDATE LIKE '%'|| #{value} ||'%'

select * from (select rownum as num, dol_name, dol_id, grade_name, substr(dol_phone,1,3)||'-'||substr(dol_phone,4,4)||'-'||substr(dol_phone,8,4) as dol_phone, dol_email, to_char(dol_enrolldate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dol_enrolldate, office_code from (select * from dolbomi left join DOL_JUDGRADE using(dgrade_no) inner join office using(office_code)
where dol_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where dol_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where office_code like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by dol_enrolldate desc))
where num >= #{startList} and num <= #{endList}
select count(*) from dol_pass where dol_name = #{dol_name} and pass_code = #{pass_code}

select dol_name, dol_id, dol_phone, dol_email, dol_address, office_name, term_name, dol_termyesno, bank, dol_account, dol_enrolldate, grade_name, salary, dol_totaltime,TRATIVE_MEASURE, licen_name from dolbomi left join office using(office_code) left join TERMS using(TERM_CODE) left join DOL_JUDGRADE using(dgrade_no) left join dol_disciplinary using(dol_id) full join DOL_LICENSE on(license_code=licen_code) where dol_id = #{dol_id}
